documents.document: @HMRCcustomers It says I do, but I have not worked in the UK, nor am I resident, nor do I have any UK income. Which seems odd.

@JosephPagani And to be fair, Blair's work on things like Clause 4 got New Labour into shape for government.
@JosephPagani No, that'd be John Smith, one of the best PMs Britain never had.
@JosephPagani Very true! So Little is somewhere between Foot and Kinnock...
@JosephPagani Neil Kinnock was an electoral failure; Andrew Little is a fair comparison there! No NZ heirs to Blair on the scene yet...
@JosephPagani The Nats are in trouble if winning the next election is the height of their aspiration: Key was much bigger picture than that.
@JosephPagani Barely, and the Tories were out for a generation after Major's defeat in 1997. He was a weak leader who damaged the brand.
Bill English is a pretty underwhelming replacement for John Key. A bit like going from Thatcher to Major.
